alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 8:48AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Marinette, Menominee, Oconto, southern Langlade and Shawano Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 847 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Branch, or 13 miles north of Shawano, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Keshena around 850 AM CDT. Legend Lake around 900 AM CDT. Gillett around 910 AM CDT. Pulaski around 930 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include College Of Menominee Nation, Lake Noseum, Breed, Mattoon, Polar, Hayes, Deerbrook, Hickory Corners, Frazer Corners and Angelica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Langlade; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County
